Dr. Damron is an Associate Professor at the University of New Mexico ( UNM ) College of Nursing and teaches health policy at the doctoral level with the UNM College of Nursing Robert Wood Johnson Foundation Nursing and Health Policy Collaborative .
Dr. Damron also conducts community based participatory research through her office , and is currently funded by the National Cancer Institute , UNM Institutional Grants , and private foundations .

Founded in 1998 , C - Change is the only organization that assembles key cancer leaders from the three sectors - private , public , and not - for - profit - and from across the cancer continuum - prevention , early detection , treatment and quality of life .
C - Change 's approach is to look at cancer , the disease most feared by Americans , as a societal burden for which we all bear the responsibility for addressing , individually and collectively .
